full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BSTAN BSRUNG SKYES BU CHEN PO DAM CAN RDO RJE LEGS PA LA BRTEN NAS BZLOG BSGYUR BYED TSUL SPU GRI CHIG TSUR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007B (CES BSTAN BSRUNG SKYES BU CHEN PO DAM CAN RDO RJE LEGS PA LA BRTEN NAS BZLOG BSGYUR BYED TSUL SPU GRI CHIG TSUR ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RANG GI CHOS DANG 'BREL BA'I SLOB MA BLA MA DKON MCHOG GSUM LA MI PHYED PA'I DAD PA DANG LDAN PA DGE TSUL BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS DANG, RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA BRTZON 'GRUS DANG LDAN PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG LHUN GRUB SOGS SLOB MA 'GA' ZHIG GIS GZHAN LA PHAN 'DOD KYI KUN PAS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA LA RKYEN BYAS, SLOB MA'I THA SHAL SKU SKYES SU MA TI AARTHA SIDHI MING CANG GYIS, ,DAM PA MKHAS PA RNAMS KYI MDZAD PA'I BZLOG BSGYUR 'DI NYID KYI YIG CHA GSAL BAR MA @008A *, ,MTHONG KYANG, CHOS SKYONG GZHAN GYI BZLOG BSGYUR GYI CHO GA DANG BSTUN NA SKYON MED DAM SNYAM PA'I LHAG BSAM DAG PAS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BSKUL BA PO DGE SLONG BLO BZANG LHUN GRUB GYIS BGYIS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , DGE'O,, ,,)
